feed.title: Port au Choix - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 4:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -20.7°C
Wind: NNW 19 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23 except minus 18 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 23 except minus 18 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
